text: aur kisee praan ko jise allaah ne haî€¼raam (avaidh) kiya hai, vadh na karo, parantu dharm vidhaan[1] ke anusaar aur jo atyaachaar se vadh (nihat) kiya gaya, hamane usake uttaraadhikaaree ko adhikaar[2] pradaan kiya hai. atah vah vadh karane mein atikraman[3] na kare, vaastav mein, use sahaayata dee gayee hai
